body: Don't do this stuff. The THP.h/_THP_CORE stuff is a mess. Peter's torch.h should be the preferred C++ interface for PYTorhc.
body_html: Don't do this stuff. The THP.h/_THP_CORE stuff is a mess. Peter's torch.h should be the preferred C++ interface for PYTorhc.
